cab.content: SEC RETMeeting of Ministers held at theForeign Office, on Tues(&ay,\13thJanuary, 1942.PRESENT:The Right Hon. Anthony Eden, M.P.,Secretary of State for ForeignAffairs. (In the Chair).The Right Hon. Viscount Simon,Lord Chancellor.The Right Hon. Sir Andrew Duncan,M.P.President of the Board of Trade.The Right Hon.. R.A. Butler, M.P.,President of the Board ofEducation.The Right Hon. R. S. Hudson,Minister of Agriculture &Fisheries.UP. ,The Right Hon. J.T.C. Moore-Brahazon, M.P., Minister of aircraft Production.The Right Hon. Lord Leathers.Minister of War Transport.The Right Hon. Lord Woolton,Minister of Food.The Right Hon. Hugh Dalton, M.P.,Minister of Economic Warfare.The Right. Hon. W.S. Morrison, M.P.,Postmaster General.NOTE: The Secretary of State for Foreign Affairs gave an account of his visit to Russia, on almost exactly the same lines as the account he gave to the War .Cabinet on January 1st, (W.M.(42) 1st Conclusions,Minute 4, Confidential Annex, of that date).
